section.name: Welcome to Citrus
section.p: Citrus is an integration testing framework written in Java that tests your Enterprise Application Integration (EAI) software to fit into your customers software landscape. The tool can easily simulate surrounding systems across various transports (e.g. Http, JMS, TCP/IP, SOAP, ...) in order to perform automatic end-to-end use case testing.

Citrus aims to
automate the integration testing for EAI applications
easily simulate interface systems supporting a wide range of protocols
perform fully qualified use case tests
provide high integration test coverage for EAI software

section.name: Technologies
section.p:
Citrus uses following technologies
Spring 2.5.x as the glue for everything
SLF4J for logging
Maven as build tool with support for multi module projects
Bamboo as build management tool for continuous integration
